title: Trump administration lawyers urge Supreme Court to bring back his revised travel ban
text: The administration's lawyers say this decision, and the others like it, were wrong according to both the Constitution and federal immigration laws. They say the Constitution makes clear that federal executives control immigration, while immigration laws say the president may "suspend the entry of all aliens or any class of aliens" if he thinks they "would be detrimental to the interests of the United States."
summary:
The administration's lawyers say this decision, and the others like it, were wrong according to both the Constitution and federal immigration laws.
They say the Constitution makes clear that federal executives control immigration, while immigration laws say the president may "suspend the entry of all aliens or any class of aliens" if he thinks they "would be detrimental to the interests of the United States."
